subject: KYC Update - Employment Information
body:
Dear KYC Team,

I recently changed my employment and would like to update my records with the bank.

Previous Employer: ABC Corporation
New Employer: Global Tech Solutions
New Position: Director of Operations
New Annual Income: $180,000

Account Number: ACC-2018-4455

I have attached:
- New employment letter
- Recent pay stub
- Updated tax information

Please update my profile accordingly.

Best regards,
David Brown
